job.title: Retail Data Analyst - Store Labor
job.description: Guitar Center embodies the world of creativity and music by encouraging staff to find their own individual sound Our mission is to develop and nurture lifelong musicians and make a difference in the world by enabling musicians and nonmusicians alike to experience the joy that comes from creating music We believe in creating inclusive environments that put our customers first all the while fulfilling our missionbrbrAs our Retail Reporting Analyst you will be responsible for handling all data and systemrelated reporting to promote growth and improved performance in all programs managed by the Store Operations team all while supporting our culture of integrity inclusion musical passion and respectbrbrA few special strongcharacteristicsstrong that make our Retail Reporting Analysts strongsuccessfulstrongbrul li strongAnalytical Skills strongAble to explore information data and reports and other items in order to identify issues and extract meaningful insights which can generally benefit all involved parties li li strongInitiative strongAble to identify opportunities amp issues and follow through on work activities to capitalize or resolve Able to take positive presentation with diverse individuals Able to interact with internal and external stakeholders at all levels in a clear concise positive and courteous mannerli li strongOrganizational Skills
